name: Hentai Tights
description:
Hentai Tights is a relaxing puzzle game.
Enjoy the beauty girls picture and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.
Watch the full picture after completing the puzzle.
Try “Administrator Mode” when you tired on puzzle.

Administrator Mode

Keyboard F: Complete Level

features

  • Beauty girls picture
  • Relaxing music
  • 100 achievements
  • Full picture
